HOW TO TRANSITION TO LIGHTNING EXPERIENCE
Apps and Packaging: What’s Different or Not Available in Lightning Experience

Find Lightning Experience availability information for AppExchange and Partner (ISVforce) Apps.

AppExchange

Many solutions on AppExchange support Lightning Experience. To check, look for the Lightning Ready certification in the listing highlights. Solutions without the Lightning Ready certification can be used in Lightning Experience, but some features may not be available or work as expected. These solutions may also appear visually inconsistent with Lightning Experience because they use Salesforce Classic styling.

Partner (ISVforce) Apps
FEATURE OR SETTING	AVAILABLE WITH DIFFERENCES	NOT AVAILABLE	NOTES
Usage Metrics Visualization App			

In Lightning Experience, you can use:

License Management App to manage licenses and support subscribers.
Environment Hub to create and manage your development, testing, and trial orgs.
Channel Order App to submit and manage customer orders.
Trialforce to provision a free trial of your offering quickly and easily.
AppExchange App Analytics to view the performance of your Lightning and Visualforce pages.
